short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A utility for wordle games, to help you notice any error before you submit an answer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Need some help on wordle to guess the word before reaching the attempts limit? Wordle Pal will help you with this. Just install this extension and go play wordle as you normally do.

Currently Wordle Pal is only available for the NYT edition.
